description: Play any instrument from a selection of more than 200 in-built voices
Split Keyboard or Layer two voices for multiple voice playback. Automatically harmonize and/or play arpeggio
Automate your band with Registration Memory and Sampling Pads
Play a one-person band along with Auto Accompaniment Styles based on various genres of music
Control any instrument effects like reverb, chorus, IIR filters, etc. Easy access faders for every channel of accompaniment style and your selected instruments
Assign knobs and sliders to multiple DSP effects along with a Master Knob which can be used to control multiple knobs and sliders. Automate Master Knob using an Low Frequency Oscillator
